list_definition.definition: a small cube, usually with numbered sides or faces, used in certain games

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is your turn to throw the dice.

list_definition.definition: to cut (vegetables etc) into small cubes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She diced the carrots for the soup.

list_definition.definition: to compete (with someone) at throwing dice; to gamble.

list_ex_of_english: After testing, it is used to make a die by pressing it against a metal disc.
Initially, a flow stream has a constant rate before entering the die, and the polymers within the stream occupy a roughly spherical conformation, maximizing entropy.
The main failure mode for die casting dies is wear or erosion.
Other features in the dies include water-cooling passages and vents along the parting lines.
The initial coin may or may not become a capped die.
Each of the 20 faces of the die has an affirmative, negative, or non-committal statement printed on it in raised letters.
Other variations include salmon, diced tomato, diced cucumber, and chopped sweet onion.
The sum of these resistances is the total thermal resistance from the die to the ambient air.
